pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Individual wall segments instead of polylines

content.raw:
I'm here thinking of where a tooltip could go... Add an item to the question mark on the palette? Add a tooltip to the `Wall` button? (currently the tool buttons don't have tooltips...)

By the way, on Inkscape angular and XY snapping is off by default and on holding `Ctrl`
content.html:
I'm here thinking of where a tooltip could go... Add an item to the question mark on the palette? Add a tooltip to the Wall button? (currently the tool buttons don't have tooltips...)

By the way, on Inkscape angular and XY snapping is off by default and on holding Ctrl
